Package com.adamsvestka.pijl.rerecodex.Model

Class User

java.lang.Object
com.adamsvestka.pijl.rerecodex.Model.Observable<User>
com.adamsvestka.pijl.rerecodex.Model.User
public class User extends Observable<User>
Represents a user in the ReCodEx system with all of their relevant information such as ID, name, email, avatar URL, and instances associated with the user. Provides methods to load user data from external API payloads, check if the user is logged in, and perform logout.

The User class extends the Observable class to enable observing changes in the user's state, making it easy for components of the application to react to user-related updates.

See Also:

      public User(UUID id)

    • isLoggedIn

      public boolean isLoggedIn()
      Whether the user is logged in.
      Returns:

      public void logout()
